subject: World Baseball Classic
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Seattle Mariners star Ichiro Suzuki hit a two-out, two-run single in the top of the 10th, and Japan beat South Korea to win its second straight World Baseball Classic.
snippet: Seattle Mariners star Ichiro Suzuki hit a two-out, two-run single in the top of the 10th, and Japan beat South Korea to win its second straight World Baseball Classic.
